about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for Super Daryl Deluxe, composed by Adriel Genet.

Track List:

  • The Legend of Daryl - 3:46
  • Noir Beginnings… The Beginnining - 2:16
  • Orientation - 1:26
  • Fanfare and Situation - 1:58
  • Hope and Stuff - 1:48
  • Noir Halls - 3:37
  • Mr. Product Manager (Paul and Alan Theme) - 1:23
  • Death of the Little Ones (Rat Stomping Theme) - 1:12
  • Do Robots Cry Electric Sheep? - 7:33
  • Monkey Kong (Gorilla Tim Boss Theme) - 1:26
  • Rats, Bats, and Asbestos, Oh My! (The Vents Noir Theme) - 3:32
  • Water Falls Royalty (Princess Noir Theme) - 1:25
  • Beethoven's 9th Symphony, Movement II (J. Sore REMIX OFFICIAL) - 15:46
  • Hearing Colors - 1:41
  • Evil Interlude Deluxe - 0:54
  • Mouth Breathers of War - 2:31
  • Legend - 1:43
  • Dice of Destiny (Dwarves and Druids Theme) - 2:45
  • Daryl of The Bells - 3:22
  • Sand in the Cracks - 3:17
  • Mummies and Deadies - 3:14
  • The Basement… of the Pyramid. - 3:55
  • Hardly a Pharaoh Fight… - 3:22
  • The Ol’ “Sandy Gauntlet” - 1:04
  • Pain in the Asp - 2:15
  • Mooshy Stuff (Wedding) - 1:03
  • World War -1 - 3:18
  • Domo Arigato Vice Principal Robatto - 2:57
  • Glitch This! - 2:36
  • PhantomBlasters - 1:15
  • Lost Halls - 3:42
  • We All Gore for Igor - 4:37
  • Valedictorian - 0:38
  • Battle Hymn of the History Nerd - 2:28
  • Royal Blood (Princess Battle) - 4:32
  • The Legend of Daryl (Karaoke Version) - 3:46
